t: Amazon Prime Benefits: What do you get with your Prime membership

t: Amazon Prime - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - In December 2016, Amazon began offering Prime membership for an alternative monthly, instead of yearly fee, of $10.99 per month, increased to $12.99 in February 2018. Amazon also announced Wickedly Prime, an own-brand line of food and beverages available to Prime members.
